sub_title: Geo-spatial, Urban & Sustainability Researcher || Faculty Member at Begum Rokeya University, BD || ITC Graduate, UT, NL
summary:
I am a geospatial and urban researcher, skilled in geospatial and statistical analysis, remote sensing applications, data integration, deprivation/inequality mapping, vulnerability mapping, land-use modelling, accessibility analysis, participatory planning, spatial data visualization, research design, questionnaire design & survey, semi-structured interview, and academic writing.

I would like to apply my geospatial, planning, and academic skills to keeping the world sustainable and livable so that our next generations can breathe and play in a healthful globe.

I have successfully completed my second MSc in Geo-information Science and Earth Observation with a specialization in Urban Planning and Management from ITC, University of Twente, the Netherlands, in July 2020. Currently, I am looking for a PhD position where I will have a chance to solve socio-environmental problems (urban environment & health, urban inequality & well-being, and climate change & disaster risk reduction-related issues).
